info: Monument is a mobile application designed to explore the rich history and cultural heritage of Uzbekistan. Through this application, users can get detailed information about the most famous and important monuments, historical places and art monuments of Uzbekistan. The application serves as a perfect guide for those interested in appreciating and preserving our cultural heritage. Through the Monument application, we aim to introduce, preserve and promote Uzbekistan's rich historical and cultural heritage to the general public. Our goal is to introduce monuments to more people and take care of them. With the Monument application, discover the historical and cultural heritage of Uzbekistan and contribute to the preservation of this heritage!
